alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 19 at 2:29PM PDT until August 21 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 8 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Strong to very strong winds 25-35 mph with gusts to 60 mph especially along high terrain, passes, and summits. Locally higher wind gusts to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Northern Elko County, Southeastern Elko County, Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, White Pine County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County, Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Southwest Elko County, South Central Elko County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 8 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for strong winds and hazardous driving conditions. High profile vehicles are most susceptible to tip-over from strong winds. Any loose equipment or outdoor furniture should be secured. Silverzone Pass, Pequop Pass, Immigrant Summit, Golconda Pass, Pinto Summit, Robinson Pass, I-80, US-50, US-93, SR-225, SR-278, SR-227, US- 95, US-6, and SR-305 are of particular concern as well as all elevated locations above 6500 feet.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
